name: AVEQIA
short_description:
Our London Venue
AVEQIA London is conveniently located minutes away from Farringdon, St. Paul’s and Blackfriars stations. Our venue provides a sanctuary at the heart of the city marrying luxury, comfort and design through Scandinavian inspiration and craftsmanship.

Our spacious kitchens are designed to accommodate private groups in a warm and inviting environment, perfect for teamwork and networking.

AVEQIA features five state of the art, kitchen and dining room studios accommodating up to 80 guests, as well as a luxurious yet comfortable private bar and lounge available for guests to enjoy. Our venue is perfect for private hire and has been used for numerous events as well as television and filming productions. 


<a href="http://www.aveqia.co.uk">team building london
